text: Soni naga n’di mwawusisye ŵanganyao (kuti): “Ana nduni juŵagumbile mawunde ni mataka?” Chisimu chene tajile: “Allah.” Jilani: “Ana nkuiona uli (isanamu) yankuilumbanjila kunneka Allah, naga Allah ali asachilile kumba masausyo, ana yalakweyo mpaka ikungunukule masausyo Gakwego? Kapena ali asachilile kumba ukoto, ana yalakweyo mpaka isiŵilile ukoto Wakweo?” Jilani: “Allah akungwanila, Kukwakwe pe ajegamile akwegamila.”
